Detailed Description

template<class FileWrapper, class OutputOperation, class NeuronListHandler>
class OutputterImpl< FileWrapper, OutputOperation, NeuronListHandler >

OutputterImpl: class template with the concrete outputting mechanisms.

Derives from OutputterBase.
The template parameter FileWrapper encapsulates the output file management, via methods open, write and close.
The template parameter OutputOperation defines a static method operation (NB: the arity can change, it must be compatible with the code in NeuronListHandler).
The template parameter NeuronListHandler has an iterator to go across the list(s) of the neurons to treat (can be couples of neurons), via a method iterate.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class FileWrapper, class OutputOperation, class NeuronListHandler>
OutputterImpl< FileWrapper, OutputOperation, NeuronListHandler >::OutputterImpl ( const Tag &  type_tag,
const Tag &  freq_tag,
const typename FileWrapper::InitValue &  init_1,
const typename OutputOperation::InitValue &  init_2,
const typename NeuronListHandler::InitValue &  init_3 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Passes the configurator to all of the mother classes FileWrapper, OutputOperation and NeuronListHandler. The types of the initialisation values are defined in each class (FileWrapper, OutputOperation and NeuronListHandler). Call FileWrapper to open the output file(s) and prepare the writing in. The InitValue types defined in FileWrapper, OutputOperation and NeuronListHandler must be copyable.

template<class FileWrapper, class OutputOperation, class NeuronListHandler>
OutputterImpl< FileWrapper, OutputOperation, NeuronListHandler >::~OutputterImpl (  )  [inline]

Destructor.

Call FileWrapper to close the file(s).
